name: The Crimson Red Kuwagata
description:
Heroes of the Far East #5
Beetle Battle Machine 1 of 2

Considered to be legend among legends in the Far East realm.
some believed that it came from the distant future, but some also believed that it was the product from the long lost destroyed civilization. Only a handful of people from each generation are lucky enough to witness this great being.

Those who are lucky said that it have the appearance of humanoid Insect, it was bigger than the highest mountain in the world. It's head resembling a crimson red stag beetle, wearing a jet black cape. Hidden beneath it's cape are a thousand lights from the distant stars across the universe.

Holding tremendous power on par with the Gods, The Crimson Red Kuwagata flew at the speed of light. Hopping from another universe to another universe. Searching for it's brethren who fell at the temptation of a dark being called the VOID. That later brought upon the massive destruction of the hyper-advanced Insectoid Civilization.

Swore to bring down the calamity, The Crimson Red Kuwagata flew endlessly across the universe to protect and put an ending to centuries old reign of terror.
